I don't know if there is something Firefox can do, or if this official dutch website is wrong in supposing that Firefox will not work anymore.

content:

title: Firefox crashes on running immediately after install
content:
Hi I've been trying to get a friend's Firefox working for him, on a 64bit W10 install, but every time it just crashes immediately.

I've uninstalled Firefox, though I had to go to the uninstall folder as it wasn't listed under Apps

I've tried downloading the full installer, installing to a different folder

Firefox never gets as far as showing in Task Manager

I've got a number of crash reports which are just empty text files; their IDs are: bp-490fe8de-2b11-47b9-a9e5-3c5950200309 bp-7152bf43-39d0-48f4-a70b-039ca0200309 bp-a362807e-de39-431d-b71a-f23790200309 bp-cde0b6c5-559f-4e6f-9b2b-3b7b50200309 bp-e87b5d15-29ad-4223-8241-d742f0200309 bp-fd5ee411-1ef2-48f8-9520-5080a0210315

Can anyone give me a clue as to what might be wrong? Thanks

PS - Chrome is also liable to crash, but Edge seems OK.

content:

Would anybody know or be able to give me some advice please?
